series.title: Loki
series.description: The god of mischief steps out of his brother's shadow to embark on an adventure that takes place after the events of Avengers: Endgame.

series.title: Wednesday
series.description: Follows Wednesday Addams' years as a student as she masters her emerging psychic ability and solves mysteries.

series.title: The Vampire Diaries
series.description: Two vampire brothers, good Stefan and the evil Damon, compete for the love of Elena Gilbert.

series.title: House of the Dragon
series.description: A prequel to Game of Thrones, exploring the history of House Targaryen.

series.title: Game of Thrones
series.description: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

series.title: Stranger Things
series.description: When a young boy disappears, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments and supernatural forces.

series.title: Squid Game
series.description: Hundreds of cash-strapped contestants accept an invitation to compete in children's games for a tempting prize, but the stakes are deadly.

series.title: Rick and Morty
series.description: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.

series.title: The Originals
series.description: A spin-off of The Vampire Diaries, focusing on the first family of vampires, the Mikaelsons.

series.title: Bridgerton
series.description: Wealth, lust, and betrayal set against the backdrop of Regency-era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

series.title: Queen Charlotte
series.description: A spin-off of Bridgerton that focuses on the rise to power of Queen Charlotte.

series.title: The Big Bang Theory
series.description: A group of brilliant but socially awkward scientists' lives are forever changed when a free-spirited beauty named Penny moves in next door.

series.title: Red Ink
series.description: A tense thriller exploring the murky world of journalism and the high stakes of investigative reporting.
